javax.accessibility.Accessible, GameListener, GameModelChangeListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, PositionChangeListener, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable
public class GameTextViewer
extends javax.swing.JEditorPane
implements GameListener, PositionChangeListener, GameModelChangeListener

Textual representation of a game on a panel.
